title: Publish the current version and provide the live share link

requirements.text: Publish the current draft/version to the live (production) site so the publicly accessible URL is updated to the latest build and can be shared.
acceptanceCriteria: The latest deployed version is live in production (not only preview).
The live site loads successfully for an unauthenticated user in a fresh/incognito browser session.
A stable public URL for the live site is available to share.

requirements.text: Ensure the existing in-app Publish/Share UI displays the correct live public URL and supports one-click copy-to-clipboard after publishing.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Publish action in the header opens the Share dialog.
The dialog shows the live site URL (not an empty string, and not a localhost URL in production).
Clicking "Copy Link" copies the shown URL to the clipboard and provides visible success feedback.
All user-facing text remains in English.

constraints: Do not reintroduce cart/checkout flows or any cart context usage.
Do not reintroduce Email or Facebook UI elements that were previously removed.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other frontend immutable paths defined by the platform.
nonGoals: Adding or configuring a custom domain.
Changing product catalog content, pricing visibility behavior, or contact methods as part of this publish request.
